definition: Feng Menglong (1574-1646), late Ming dynasty novelist writing in colloquial (baihua), author of Stories Old and New 古今小說|古今小说[Gu3 jin1 Xiao3 shuo1]
surname Feng

surname Long

sentences.english: Feng Menglong made a great achievement in composing and adapting Chinese traditional operas.
sentences.chinese: 馮夢龍在戲曲創作和改編方面取得了重大成就。

sentences.english: This reflects that Feng Menglong heartily sympathized with these protagonists.
sentences.chinese: 這反映出馮夢龍由衷地同情書中的這些主要人物。
